summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of The Alley in Block 8, Bay View Addition, being the alley between 28th Avenue West and 29th Avenue West from Ruffner Street to Tilden Street; and certain other alleys; by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 16466 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
